description: A small desk sits in the middle of the warehouse type building.
The building mainly being used for crates and storage, the ammo shop
guy sits at the desk, with a few crates next to him.
51347.name: Magitek Port Ammo Shop

description: All around is open fields, for miles on end.  To the west the
fields end at a forest, and behind the forest large mountains.  To the
north a massive wall stands, of the Vectorian Fortress.  Some other
buildings can be seen around the wall, and movement of guards.  All
around you is fields.
51306.name: {MV{mector {MC{mity {MR{moad{x

description: A large iron door appears in the northern brick wall, the iron
letters on the heavy wooden door reads {MV{mector {MC{mity {MJ{mail{x.  Other than
that there is nothing here along Main Street besides two large brick
walls, the northern one housing the Magitek Factory and City Jail, the
southern one housing the Industrial Zone.  Westwards opens up to Kefka
Square, the eastern square of New Vector City.  Eastwards the street
wanders off between the two brick walls to Old Vector City, which was
once the Fortress of Vector.
{x
51374.name: {c-[ {MM{main {MS{mtreet {MV{mector {c]-{x

description: The road continues north and south, heading towards the Magitek
Factory to the north.  To the east is the iron sides of the fortress,
and beyond that, the rest of this area.  To the west is open fields,
and a forest in the distance.  The magitek factory is just northwest.
51345.name: {c-[ {MM{magitek {MF{mactory {MR{moad {c]-{x

construction place of Magitek Armor and processing plant for its
Magicite Fuel.  Behind the south wall is the new Industrial Zone,
particularly the Worker's Dormitory.  Westwards leads to the newly
built Vector City while eastwards leads to 'Old Vector City' which was
once the Fortress of Vector, home of the Geomancer airship, Port of
Vector and Magitek Army Stronghold.

description: The brick road of Main Street continues on its east-west path along
the old main halls of the Fortress of Vector.  A three way
intersection opens up here, with the northern street leading to the
{MA{mirship {MP{mort of {MV{mector{x.  South use to be the chambers of the Fortress
Guards, now replaced by a new brick building.  Eastwards is the still
existing Magitek Army Stronghold.

description: A small warehouse type building stands here, with engine parts
lined up on shelves above, and engines laying on the floor.  Somewhere
in the mess is a mechanic for your needs.
51350.name: Magitek Port Engine Shop

51351.name: {MT{mhe {MM{magitek {MA{mirship {MP{mort{B [S]{x

description: The brick street of Main Street follows the path of the western
hallway of the old Fortress of Vector.  The rooms and chambers are now
gone and replaced by newer brick buildings, people's homes and
assorted shops.  Eastwards is the Old Vectorian Square, what was once
the Fortress Lobby and the still standing Iron Fortress Gates.
Westwards leads to what was an open field, replaced by a newly built
city.
{x
51339.name: {c-[ {MM{main {MS{mtreet {MV{mector {c]-{x

description: The brick street of Main Street follows what was the main hallway
of the Fortress of Vector before its deconstruction.  At the end of
the east wing was the Magitek Army Stronghold, which still exists.
The hallway is now gone, replaced by this brick street.  Where rooms
once stood are now newer built brick buildings to the north and south.
Westwards Main Street follows to the old iron gates of the Fortress,
and the new Vector City.
{x
51334.name: {c-[ {MM{main {MS{mtreet {MV{mector {c]-{x

description: The brick street of Main Street travels westwards between two very
tall brick walls.  Behind the north wall is the Magitek Factory, the
construction place of Magitek Armor and processing plant for its
Magicite Fuel.  Behind the south wall is the new Industrial Zone,
particularly the Worker's Dormitory.  Westwards leads to the newly
built Vector City while eastwards leads to 'Old Vector City' which was
once the Fortress of Vector, home of the Geomancer airship, Port of
Vector and Magitek Army Stronghold.
51372.name: {c-[ {MM{main {MS{mtreet {MV{mector {c]-{x

description: A small stone road leads off of Main Street Vector to the north
heading towards the Magitek Facility.  To the east is the fortress,
and back south is Main Street Vector, which leads to all other
facilities in this area.
51344.name: {c-[ {MM{magitek {MF{mactory {MR{moad {c]-{x

description: All around is open fields, for miles on end.  To the west the
fields end at a forest, and behind the forest large mountains.  To the

around you is fields.

51319.name: {gThe {GFi{gel{Gds {gof {MV{mector{x

around you is fields.
51327.name: {gThe {GFi{gel{Gds {gof {MV{mector{x

description: A not so well kept courtyard spreads out over North Castle Drive,
and the backside of the brick wall lining North Castle Drive can be
seen from in here.  Southwards the small courtyard disappears again
into Castle Drive, and only a few short meters leads Eastwards stands
a massive brick building, its outter walls lined with windows.  A pair
of massive wooden double doors stands at the eastern end of the
building, words etched into the arched wood above it reads 'WORKERS
DORMITORY'.  On the opposite side courtyard is an identical set of
doors to the western building, which reads 'FACTORY'.
51368.name: {MT{mhe {RInd{Yustr{Rial {YZ{Ron{Ye {MC{mourtyard{x

description: Inside you find a small building, with a small counter in one
corner, and old seats lined up against the wall.  Behind the small
counter sits some pilots, and other people, but the offices look like
something out of a small old airport.  The smell of stale cigarette
smoke and coffee is heavy.
51349.name: Magitek Port Offices

description: All around is open fields, for miles on end.  To the west the
fields end at a forest, and behind the forest large mountains.  To the
north a massive wall stands, of the Vectorian Fortress.  Some other
buildings can be seen around the wall, and movement of guards.  All
around you is fields.
51317.name: {gThe {GFi{gel{Gds {gof {MV{mector{x

around you is fields.
51324.name: {gThe {GFi{gel{Gds {gof {MV{mector{x

description: Large gates to the east open up into the Airship Port, a small facility
surrounded by large buildings.  The Port Road continues to the south.

51354.name: Magitek Port Weapon Shop

51316.name: {gThe {GFi{gel{Gds {gof {MV{mector{x

description: Inside looks like a garage, with airships parked inside being
worked on.  Body and engines.  A few workers wander around.
51355.name: Magitek Port Repair Shop

51343.name: {c-[ {MM{main {MS{mtreet {MV{mector {c]-{x

description: A large field stands here, open to the winds.  A dirt road leads to
the east into the fields and off.  In the far north the massive wall
of the Vectorian Fortress stands.  The road continues north through a
field.
51300.name: {MV{mector {MC{mity {MR{moad{x

description: The brick of Main Street comes to a halt here before the iron gates
of the {MM{magitek {RA{Mrm{Ry {MS{mtronghold{x, home to the country's armed forces and
other related operations.  This door was inside when the Fortress of
Vector had existed but has now become an outside door with the
deconstruction of the Fortress.  Two newer buildings stand on either
side of the street, and Vector City itself is westwards.
{x
51335.name: {c-[ {MM{main {MS{mtreet {MV{mector {c]-{x

description: The brick street of Main Street travels westwards between two very
tall brick walls.  Behind the north wall is the Magitek Factory, the
construction place of Magitek Armor and processing plant for its
Magicite Fuel.  Behind the south wall is the new Industrial Zone,
particularly the Worker's Dormitory.  Westwards leads to the newly
built Vector City while eastwards leads to 'Old Vector City' which was
once the Fortress of Vector, home of the Geomancer airship, Port of
Vector and Magitek Army Stronghold.
51373.name: {c-[ {MM{main {MS{mtreet {MV{mector {c]-{x

description: To the north once stood a massive iron door leading out of the old
Fortress of Vector, now replaced by a brick wall and wrought iron
gate.  Behind the gate is the stone pathway to the {MM{magitek {RFa{Ycto{Rry{x,
the famous facility which constructs the iron Magitek Armor beasts,
but also processes and creates the Magicite Fuel to power them.  From
this point westwards the brick street of Main Street passes between
two very large brick walls, the north hiding the Magitek Factory and
the south hiding the new industrial factories.  Eastwards is the Old
Vector Square and the large old iron fortress gates, with the airship
port and Magitek Stronghold beyond that.
{x
51341.name: {c-[ {MM{main {MS{mtreet {MV{mector {c]-{x

around you is fields.

51328.name: {gThe {GFi{gel{Gds {gof {MV{mector{x

description: A large warehouse type building stands here with airship frames and
hulls.  A few workers work on the hull of one airship.
51359.name: Magitek Port Hull Shop

description: Northwards is the Industrial Zone Courtyard built into Castle
Drive, from that location the doors to either building on either side
of the street can be accessed.  Beyond that is the gates of the
Industrial Zone and the rest of Castle Drive, ending at Kefka Square.
Southwards the street continues to a large wooden door, the backdoor
of Castle Vector.
51369.name: {MN{morth {MC{mastle {MD{mrive{x

description: Two large black towers appear on either side of Castle Drive, the
windows above reveal nothing but most would rather assume there are
guards in those towers, possibly waiting to attack if needed.
Southwards a large wooden door stands.  A small covered window about
eye level allows the guards behind it to see who approaches, as the
supplies and workers of the Castle arrive at this door daily.
Northwards Castle Drive heads into the courtyard of the Industrial
Zone.  Beyond that are the gates leading to Vector City.
51370.name: {MN{morth {MC{mastle {MD{mrive{x

51353.name: {MT{mhe {MM{magitek {MA{mirship {MP{mort{B [N]{x

description: Before you stands the massive iron wall of the Fortress known as
Vector.  After the war with the Tripower, Vector was left standing in
ruins.  Kefka ordered the massive city in front of the fortress was
torn down for scrap metal, and even the Fortress of Vector was torn
down for the metal itself.  Kefka left this one remaining wall for
protection and a monument to what was once glories in the Vectorian
Nation.  The massive doors still stand, guarded by Two Vectorian
Warriors.
51307.name: {MT{mhe {MO{mld {MF{mortress {MG{mates {Mo{mf {MV{mector {MC{mity{x

description: {x
{x                              {RTHE EMPIRE OF
{x               {&[ {MM {mA G I T E K  {MA{m I R S H I P  {MP{m O R T {&]{x
51360.name: Entrance to the {MM{magitek {MP{mort{x

description: This wide street heads southwards towards Castle Vector, home of
the Higher Vectorian Government and the Emperor himself.  On either
side of the street are the same brick walls seen from main street.
Behind either wall stands large tall brick buildings, on the west side
the building has massive brick smoke stacks reaching out from the
roof.  The building east has none.  Southwards the walls move in and a
large iron gate can be seen.  Northwards is Kefka Square and Vector
City.
51366.name: {MN{morth {MC{mastle {MD{mrive{x

description: The brick street of Main Street travels westwards between two very
tall brick walls.  Behind the north wall is the Magitek Factory, the
construction place of Magitek Armor and processing plant for its
Magicite Fuel.  Behind the south wall is the new Industrial Zone,
particularly the Worker's Dormitory.  Westwards leads to the newly
built Vector City while eastwards leads to 'Old Vector City' which was
once the Fortress of Vector, home of the Geomancer airship, Port of
Vector and Magitek Army Stronghold.
51364.name: {c-[ {MM{main {MS{mtreet {MV{mector {c]-{x

description: A large wrought iron gate stands southwards blocking the southern
path of North Castle Drive, leading to Castle Vector.  The castle
itself can be seen through the gate only a few meters away.  The
roadway itself disappears into what looks to be a large courtyard.  On
the east side a large pair of double doors leads into the eastern
building, the large words 'WORKER DORMITORY' etched into the wooden
arch.  Westwards an almost identical set of double doors leads into
the western building, the letters over that door reading 'FACTORY'.
Northwards Castle Drive leads to Kefka Square and Vector City.

description: The brick street of Main Street continues westwards along what was
once the western hallway and western wing of the Fortress of Vector,
what was once chambers of the grand place is now open air and newly
built brick buildings, housing people's homes and shops.  To the east
the hallway, now street leads to Old Vector Square, the remains of the
grand Fortress lobby, its marble floor now making up the square
itself.  To the west the hallway would lead to the famed Magitek
Factory.
{x
51340.name: {c-[ {MM{main {MS{mtreet {MV{mector {c]-{x

description: All around is open fields, for miles on end.  To the west the

buildings can be seen around the wall, and movement of guards.  All
around you is fields.
51308.name: {gThe {GFi{gel{Gds {gof {MV{mector{x

description: The brick street of Main Street continues to lead east and west
along what was once the Main Hallway of the East Wing of the Fortress
of Vector.  This hallway once lead to the secondary jails, Fortress
Guard chambers and the home of the armed forces, the Magitek Army
Stronghold.  With the deconstruction of the Fortress it has become an
outdoor street.  The Stronghold can still be found along with the
newer Airship Port of Vector, and assorted new buildings and shops.
West leads to the old lobby of the Fortress and the still standing
Iron Gates.
{x
51331.name: {c-[ {MM{main {MS{mtreet {MV{mector {c]-{x

description: The road continues north and south, heading towards the Magitek
Airship Port.  To the west is the fortress.  To the northeast is the
port.

description: The road continues north and south, heading towards the Magitek
Airship Port.  To the west is the fortress.  To the northeast is the
port.

51352.name: {MT{mhe {MM{magitek {MA{mirship {MP{mort{x

description: Anyone who stands here stood in what was the grand lobby of the
Fortress of Vector now {M____             ____{x deconstruction for the
construction of a new   {M\\               //{x  Airship-Fortress dubbed
the Geomancer.  The old  {M\\             //{x  iron fortress had stood
for centuries and many    {M\\           //{x  parties had taken place in
the grand lobby.  Its      {M\\         //{x  marble floor still stands
here as part of the city    {M\\       //{x  square, the rest of the old
fortress now gone and        {M\\     //{x  replaced by the newly built
city of Vector.  The Fortress {M\\   //{x  had taken many blows from the
Tripower Kingdom during the    {M\\ //{x  two wars fought between the two
great nations.  Emperor Kefka   {M\+/{x  had the iron built fortress taken
apart for his new fortress, unused materials would go towards the
construction of Vector City, which now occupies what was a field to the
west of the Fortress.  Despite this area not being the capital city of
Vector, some have come to see it as such.  From the marble square the
new Geomancer Airship can be seen, still in its construction cradle.
Eastwards was once the east wing of the Fortress, now East Main Street.
The old Magitek Army Stronghold still stands as its own building, along
with the new Airship Port of Vector and assorted newly built brick
buildings.  Westwards was the West Wing of the Fortress, now home to the
new factories and city.  Southwards stands the Old Fortress Gates and part
of the main fortress wall, now a city wall and memorial to what once stood
here.
51329.name: {m-{M={c[ {MO {ml d {*+ {MV{m e c t o r {*+ {MS{m q u a r e {C]{M={m-{x

description: A small stone road leads off the Main Street Vector north along the
sides of the fortress to the west, and the Magitek Airship Port to the
northeast.
51336.name: {c-[ {MM{magitek {MP{mort {MR{moad {c]-{x

description: All around is open fields, for miles on end.  To the west the
fields end at a forest, and behind the forest large mountains.  To the
north a massive wall stands, of the Vectorian Fortress.  Some other
buildings can be seen around the wall, and movement of guards.  All
around you is fields.
51322.name: {gThe {GFi{gel{Gds {gof {MV{mector{x

description: The brick street of Main Street travels westwards between two very
tall brick walls.  Behind the north wall is the Magitek Factory, the
construction place of Magitek Armor and processing plant for its
Magicite Fuel.  Behind the south wall is the new Industrial Zone,
particularly the Worker's Dormitory.  Westwards leads to the newly
built Vector City while eastwards leads to 'Old Vector City' which was
once the Fortress of Vector, home of the Geomancer airship, Port of
Vector and Magitek Army Stronghold.

Vectorian Armed Forces, a City Watch Guard.

description:
After all the years of doing good and helping,
the gods have blessed Joram with immortality,
in return that he helps out other adventurers
that he was once in his life.
Type 'heal' to see a listing of spells.
51350.room_name: A healer stands here, healing fellow worshippers.
51350.name: a healer~
